.btn:hover{background-color:#000}.contenedor .delmes{grid-area:delmes;padding:3%}.contenedor .delmes1{grid-area:delmes1;text-align:center;margin:10% auto;display:flex;align-items:center}.contenedor 10px;border:none;cursor:pointer;border-radius:10px}}header{width:100%;height:100px;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;background:#fff;color:#000}.nav,header{display:flex}.nav{margin-right:15%;justify-content:space-around;width:30%}.navlink{list-style:none;margin:.5em;letter-spacing:2px}.navlink a{color:#000;text-decoration:none;font-size:1.2em}.burger{font-size:3em;display:none}@media screen and (max-width:830px){.burger{display:block}.nav{z-index:1;margin-right:5%;background:#fff;position:absolute;right:-100%;top:145px;width:40%;height:50%;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-around;padding:0;transition:all .4s}.navlink{text-align:center}.nav-active{right:0}}a img{transition:1.5s ease}a img:hover{transform:scale(1.1)}.contenedor .btn{border-color:#037872;color:#fff;box-shadow:inset 0 0 40px 40px typing{0%{width:0}to{width:100%}}@keyframes typing{0%{width:0}to{width:100%}}@-webkit-keyframes blink-caret{0%,to{border-color:transparent}50%{border-color:#000}}@keyframes blink-caret{0%,to{border-color:transparent}50%{border-color:#000}}
